alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Benton, northwestern Madison, western Carroll and northeastern Washington Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 515 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of War Eagle, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Berryville... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Lowell... Hindsville... Forum... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Withrow Springs State Park... War Eagle... Johnson... Goshen... Beaver Lake... Larue... Alabam... Best... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 68 and 82, and near mile marker 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
